frameDefinitions: An Entity is understood to be experienceable within a particular set of delimited Circumstances, which may be more narrowly expressed by a Time, Place.
An Entity exists at a particular Location, at a particular Time, as observed by an implicit observer.
An Agent decides temporarily not to perform a Desirable_action or not to interact with a Salient_entity.
A Cause, animate or inanimate, causes a process, the Effect, to begin.
A Cognizer calls up an episodic memory of past Experience or an Impression of a Salient_entity formed  on the basis of past experience.
An Entity that is previously not visible to a Perceiver becomes visible.
frameExamples: This type of behavior <t>occurs</t> in several primate mating rituals.
Liquid water was <t>present</t> on the surface of Mars billions of years ago.
I have actually <t>held off</t> on buying some movies by WB because of those damned cases.
The murder of Sergei Kirov <t>set off</t> a chain of events that culminated in the Great Terror of the 1930s.
Kozmo could <t>remember</t> when his modem was the fastest he could buy.
The armada <t>appeared</t> on the horizon at sunset.
listRoleDefinitions: An object or event that is described as being available under delimited Conditions.
A temporal characterization of the circumstances of the existence of an <fen>Entity</fen>.
A spacial characterization of the <fex name=''>Circumstances</fex> of the existence of the <fex name=''>Entity</fex>.
A description of the state of the world in which the <fen>Entity</fen> can be experienced.
The <fen>Entity</fen> whose existence at the <fen>Location</fen> is confirmed.
The <fen>Location</fen> of the <fen>Entity</fen>. The <fen>Location</fen> is conceived as a ground for an event of inspection to determine the presense of the <fen>Entity</fen>.
The time when the <fen>Entity</fen> is present at the <fen>Location</fen>.
The <fen>Agent</fen> decides not to engage in a <fen>Desirable_action</fen> for a while or not to interact with a <fen>Salient_entity</fen>.
<fen>Desirable_action</fen> identifies the event or activity in which the <fen>Agent</fen> does not engage for a while.
An entity that evokes a contextually inferrable <fen>Desirable_action</fen> that the <fen>Agent</fen> is temporarily forgoing.
This role identifies the interval of <fen>Time</fen> during which the the forgoing occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the temporary forgoing occurs.
An animate or inanimate entity, a force, or event that produces an effect. Volitionality is not a necessary characteristic of <fen>Cause</fen>s.
This Frame Element marks expressions that indicate the process that the <fen>Cause</fen> initiates.
This role is for the <fen>Time</fen>  when causing to start occurs
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Effect</fen> occurs.
A person who recalls memories of past experience or impressions.
A person or thing that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembers as being involved in some state or event or as having some property.
A past event or state that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> witnessed and is now recalling. The <fen>Experience</fen> may be a specific event or state or a vaguer period that is treated as a unit.

A property that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> attributes to the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> based on their past experience of the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> or a category to which the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> is assigned.
A property or role that a <fen>Salient_entity</fen> actually held and which frames the memories that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has of the <fen>Salient_entity</fen>.
The time when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembers the experience.
The thing that the <fen>Perceiver</fen> is able to see or recognize.
A temporal description of the event of the <fen>Entity</fen> becoming visible.
The physical location in which the <fen>Entity</fen> becomes visible.
listRoleExamples: Instead, <fex>he</fex> held off on a public announcement of his decision for more than a year.
The board also waited <fex>with the appointment of seven members to the planning and zoning commission</fex> until a policy is set regarding requirements.
I ordered the blackberry cobbler with ice cream for dessert and held off <fex>on another pint</fex> as the rain kept coming down.

Saskatchewan teachers are not a happy lot as they had voted for a strike in June
<fex>then</fex> held off on it to give negotiations a chance during the summer.
Few things spark <fex>the wrath of the British</fex> like food additives.
<fex>In Obscurania</fex>, the release of the movie sparked protests.
I will truly miss Delmar and <fex>I</fex> will always remember when his eyes lit up everytime he got ice-cream.
today I saw a sister's exclassmate, and didn't recognise him, I remember <fex>him</fex> taller.
I can still remember <fex>saying the pledge every morning before class in elementary school</fex>, a rare occurrence among elementary school kids nowadays.
I remember Peter <fex>as immensely kind in those first three weeks before I was packed off to boarding school</fex>.
Atulprasad is principally remembered <fex>as a musician and composer</fex>.

The Fourth Wall Will Not Protect You
"The Man in the Moon Stayed Up Too Late"
The Winged Nazgul in the Amon Hen
the Fighter, Gandalf is the Mage
The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
